Text.Page:
Mission Orders

We must weaken the Scions of Lok by killing their defenders.

Take out the {@LinkCreature:7#12#Lokian lancers} and {@LinkCreature:7#13#berserkers} in the Cardovek Remnants.

Report to Zandra in Lumbertown when mission is complete.
You've earned the thanks of the federation. Your guild is an inspiration to all!
It looks like you haven't completed your mission yet.
